description: This Python source file demonstrates how to use the Supabase MCP server to create projects, manage database schemas, deploy edge functions, and perform related operations for a Supabase project. It includes setup instructions, environment variable handling, and an asynchronous function to orchestrate the project setup and validation process.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that orchestrates the setup and validation of a Supabase project using MCP tools and an AI agent, based on a provided task description.
